div.bibl: L'Italia, Mar. 8, 1914. [TWENTY-FIFTH ANNIVERSARY OF FOUNDING OF MISSIONARY SISTERS]

body.p: During the month of March will occur the 25th anniversary of the foundation of the Missionary Sisters of the Sacred Heart of Jesus in America. This event will be celebrated with festivities at which Mother Francesca Saveria Cabrini will be present. For this occasion Mother Cabrini will be presented with the donations given to the funds by the Italian Colony of Chicago for the enlargement of the Columbus Extension Hospital which has now become too small for the growing needs.
